dt-example.title: Bootstrap 3
dt-example.info:
This is the `-init searchPanes`extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example shows DataTables and the searchPanes extension being used with the [Bootstrap 3](http://getbootstrap.com) framework providing the styling. The [DataTables / Bootstrap integration](//datatables.net/manual/styling/bootstrap) provides seamless integration for DataTables to be used in a Bootstrap page.
